Text: I was just getting ready to thank you when I read below that this is an epub and mobi...sucks.

@cawoodie

The only thing  that sucks is you

If you can't read,don't blame anyone but yourself

You idiot
Thanks BBS.  I wish MORE books were offered here in either ePub or Mobi.  Much nicer to read and smaller in size, for the most part.
Oops - sorry.  I meant bpfine - my head isn't always on straight these days!
